archimate:Requirement.name: IM.1.4.7b: b) should be hardened before use (e.g. secure configuration of fax machines and other multi-function devices to ensure deletion of information from their local memories or the use of personal codes to access information)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
